name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Mt Juliet-Nashville Area

reviews.text: This is a great new HIE. The hotel is very modern and well decorated.
reviews.title: Great New Holiday Inn Express

reviews.text: We had a group of about 10 staying here for my granddaughters birthday. Everything was as clean and fresh as it has always been since it opened. Food was good, staff were friendly and polite. I always get a great night's sleep when staying at this hotel. We enjoy the convenience to shopping and restaurants. The grandchildren enjoy the indoor pool.
reviews.title: Always great

reviews.text: Went back to Middle Tennessee for my uncle's 80th birthday. Chose this hotel over those nearer Nashville because of past reviews. My stepson had stayed here a month or so before for the same reason.
reviews.title: Back Home Again

reviews.text: Facilities here are excellent: Clean and quiet. I especially noticed that the a/c unit, which was the same unit in most HI Express hotels, was actually quiet and wired properly to a thermostat in the center of the room. I was able to turn on the fan full time--a rare experience. When the a/c actually was on, it didn't sound like a pile driver outside the window.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: I especially appreciated James, the night clerk, who helped with some confusion about the coffee maker in the room. He is an exceptional employee, not to take away from the others who were very courteous.
reviews.title: Convenient, Clean, Friendly

reviews.text: As for the coffee maker--ugh. They should just discard all of these units until they can afford something better. It's a single cup thing that uses a prepackaged packet and a styrofoam cup. Doesn't make anything that approaches coffee, much less good coffee. This is why they didn't get 5 stars.
reviews.title: Great Hotel!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On the Feb. review, I must have hit ones instead of 5's for quality and satisfaction. I just noticed and asked TripAdvisor to remove the review. I stayed there again this weekend and everything was as clean and great as it was previously. The front desk staff were wonderful and accomodating. Easy check-in and check-out. The breakfast bar was delicious as always. The room was very clean and quiet (even for a 1st floor room and an 8 year old birthday party happening). With a side entrance now open, it is easy to get to Providence to dine and shop.
reviews.title: Great hotel! posted wrong on previous review

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed for two 1-night visits while driving to/from Raleigh, NC. Hotel has easy access onto I-40 and is part of a new shopping center (Del Webb's Providence) with plenty of stores and restaurants, incl. fast food joints. Also has two gas stations within a mile of the hotel.
reviews.title: Nice hotel for I-40 travelers

reviews.text: Hotel itself is new, clean and very well run. Staff is very friendly, free breakfast offered both hot and cold items and there were free newspapers also. Rooms are very nice sized and have small fridge, coffee maker, flatscreen TV and free wi-fi. Overall, a very nice hotel.
reviews.title: Clean, Comfortable, Convenient

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for my daughter's wedding. The hotel was nice, clean, and had a great breakfast in the mornings, including eggs, bacon, chocolate muffins!, cinnamon rolls, bagels, cereal, toast. It was all tasty. The room we had was one king bed non smoking and it was a large room with a small refrig, desk, internet. Of course, I had to ask for more coffee. They had the one small pod for one cup coffee maker. Convenient location right off I--40. Close to restaurants, strip mall, bars.
reviews.title: Everything went well, the place it very nice.

reviews.text: We stayed here for a weekend getaway trip with our 3 kids. The booking, the welcome and all the services were awesome. The place was one of the most clean place that I have stayed from the entrance to the pool area and room. I would recommend this hotel to anyone and everyone, don't think twice.
reviews.title: New and complete

aka: Holiday Inn Express Hotel And Suites Mt Juliet-Nashville Area
description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites in Mt. Juliet-Nashville area 19 miles away. The newest Mt. Juliet hotel is just quick 10 miles away to Nashville International Airport (BNA). Our spacious guest rooms and executive suites are beyond exceptional in decor and privacy and have everything you expect from an informatively designed hotel. All rooms include refrigerator & microwave, wireless high-speed Internet, work desk, ergonomic chair with ottoman, and 32' flat panel TV. Holiday Inn Express & Suites in Mt. Juliet will be a perfect lodging facility for business and leisure which includes a 24-hr business center, 24-hr guest laundry, 24-hr fitness center, and the salt water indoor heated swimming pool. Start your day off enjoying our complimentary Express Start breakfast across from a 63' flat panel TV and Internet access pods chairs. From our 'fresh, modern style' decor, state-of-the art amenities and modern eatery, our guest have the most memorable experience. Area attractions: Nashville Super Speedway 'closest and preferred hotel', Nashville Shores, Hermitage Andrew Jackson, Providence Market Place, Grand Ole Opry, golf, etc. Businesses: Del Webb, Dell Computers, Lochinavr, Nashville Auto Auction, Bridgestone Firestone, Cracker Barrel Corporate Offices, Genesco Hospitals: Summit Medical Center, University Medical Center Stay Smart at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Mt. Juliet, TN.
